Posts.Content: Well done sarg.you are where I want to be in 8 weeks. Still leaking quite a bit and on 2 pads a day after 4 weeks.however I am confident things will get better over time. How much walking do you do per day?my doctor says swimming is excellent for pelvic floor muscles as well as walking. I think I started the cialas too soon and intend to give them a miss until dryer down below. In any event continence is more important at this point. Pauly

Posts.Content: How many kegels a day do you do sarg.im 7 weeks in now and still on 2 pads a day.morning up to about 1.30pm just a few drops but a bit more in late afternoon and evening especially if im doing something physical.however I'm hopeful things will improve overtime. Just hoping I'm doing enough kegels,300 a day ,well most days.have not tried the pump .on cialis but my mojo has not returned yet! Best of luck and thanks for your insightful contributions.great help. Pauly

Posts.Content: Thanks for that.im 53 and have good fitness,t.g. From what I have read ,as you are quiet young,your potency should return quicker than most. Yes my weapon has reduced in size.appears battered and bruised.Thanks to catheter. Right now my main concern is recovering continence and worry about libido later. How is your continence. Pauly4
Posts.Title: Nerve sparing robotic surgery

Posts.Content: Had my robotic surgery last Thursday 31st jan.surgeon could only save right side nerve bundle.cancer contained within capsule. What are my chances of maintaining a workable erection in the long term. Anyone had similar experience. Nov 2012- psa 6.9 Dec-2012-biopsy report- 4 cores gl 6, one core gl 7,3+4 with 70per cent spread Da Vinci robotic on 31st jan 2013 Cathater coming out fri 8th feb 2013.
Posts.Title: Nerve sparing robotic surgery

Posts.Content: Don't be discouraged.be patient.not my words but the words of my urologist.i suppose these words apply to us all. My catheter coming out tomorrow so will know then about continence.
